description: Discover all the mobs of Stellaris

infos.title: Alien
infos.description: This is an Alien. This passive mob can be found on the moon

infos.title: Alien Zombie
infos.description: This is an Alien Zombie. A ancient force corrupt this alien and now it's a zombie. This aggressive mob can be found on the moon

infos.description: This is a Star Crawler. This monster mob can be found on the moon
